text: Ana hu'neankino Anumzamofo arimpahe zama esanigeno'a, iza oti hankavetino nemanisigeno, iza knarera hu'nesia vahemo rimpa ahe'zana oti hankavetineno erino vugahie? Anumzamofo arimpa ahe'zamo'a teve nefamo'ma hiaza huno ruhagana hagana huno herafiramigahie. Ana nehanigeno Agrama kama ne-e sanigeno'a haveramimo'a tamana tamanu huno fuzafuperamigahie.
